definitions.definition: The act of enumerating , making separate mention, or recounting .
A detailed account, in which each thing is specially noticed.
A list ; especially, a numbered list .
examples: using the serial comma in enumerations

definitions.definition: A recapitulation , in the peroration, of the heads of an argument.
A data type that allows variables to have any of a predefined set of values.

main_definition: The act of enumerating , making separate mention, or recounting .
secondary_definitions: A detailed account, in which each thing is specially noticed.
A list ; especially, a numbered list .
A recapitulation , in the peroration, of the heads of an argument.
( programming ) A data type that allows variables to have any of a predefined set of values.
